Description: Bronze nail with a polygonal section; shaft complete to point but head missing; hammered; bent at right angles in two places and surface very corroded.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Curator's comments: No recorded context. See H. Walters in 'Excavations in Cyprus' (1900), pp. 57-86 for details of the Turner Bequest Excavations.
